verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Woe is to a slanderer back biter.
verse.verse_2: Who gathered wealth and kept it counted.
verse.verse_3: Does the think that his wealth will make him immortal?
verse.verse_4: Never, he shall be surely thrown into the crusher.
verse.verse_5: And what made you known, what is the crusher?
verse.verse_7: One which shall rise over the hearts.
verse.verse_8: Undoubtedly, it will be closer in on them.
